sentences.en: a person's family/social/cultural/educational/class background
sentences.cn: 一个人的出身 / 社会 / 文化 / 教育 / 阶级背景

sentences.en: a photograph with trees in the background
sentences.cn: 以树木为远景的照片

sentences.en: Against a background of impending famine, heavy fighting took place.
sentences.cn: 即将发生饥荒之时, 严重的战乱爆发了.

sentences.en: All trace of his working - class background was deliberately obscured.
sentences.cn: 他 工人阶级 出身的所有痕迹都给有意地隐藏起来了.

sentences.en: Do you know anything about his background?
sentences.cn: 关于他的背景，你知道什么吗？

sentences.en: He could hear her dog barking and whining in the background.
sentences.cn: 他能听见她的狗在暗处吠叫、哀嚎。

sentences.en: He had learnt how to melt invisibly into the background.
sentences.cn: 他已经学会如何退居幕后.

sentences.en: Her dress has pink flowers on a white background.
sentences.cn: 她的衣服白底子上有粉红花朵.

sentences.en: I kept hearing the sound of applause in the background.
sentences.cn: 我不断听到隐约的鼓掌声。

sentences.en: In the background, dressed in pale green, stood Eunice.
sentences.cn: 尤妮斯穿着浅绿色的衣服站在后面不起眼的地方。

sentences.en: It’s important to understand other people, people from different backgrounds .
sentences.cn: 要理解别人，理解那些来自不同背景的人，这是很重要的。

sentences.en: Robbie was there with his family, keeping rather in the background.
sentences.cn: 罗比和他的家人一起在那里，深居简出。

sentences.en: Rosemary likes to stay in the background.
sentences.cn: 罗斯玛丽不喜欢抛头露面。

sentences.en: She had a way of fading into the background when things got rough.
sentences.cn: 情况一有不妙，她总能退到幕后。

sentences.en: She has a background in child psychology.
sentences.cn: 她受过儿童心理学的教育.

sentences.en: Students with a background in chemistry will probably find the course easier.
sentences.cn: 学过化学的学生可能会觉得这门课程容易些。

sentences.en: The background to the current troubles is provided by the dire state of the country's economy.
sentences.cn: 目前这些问题的背景是严峻的国家经济形势。

sentences.en: The book's cover has white lettering on a blue background.
sentences.cn: 本书封面为蓝底白字.

sentences.en: The meeting takes place against a background of continuing political violence.
sentences.cn: 这次会议是在持续的政治暴力背景下召开的。

sentences.en: The president’s advisors are content to remain in the background.
sentences.cn: 总统的顾问甘居幕后。

sentences.en: The riots took place against a background of widespread unemployment.
sentences.cn: 暴乱是在普遍失业的情况下发生的.

sentences.en: Though his background was modest, it was in no sense deprived.
sentences.cn: 尽管他家境一般，但也并不算贫穷。

sentences.en: Use the transferable skills acquired from your previous working background.
sentences.cn: 先前工作中学到的技能能为现在所用的就多加利用。

words.tran_cn: 政府官员举行的记者招待会；提供背景资料的简报或报告

phrases.tran_cn: 学术背景；学历；教育背景
工作经历；企业背景；事情履历
学历；教育背景；教育程度
[美国、加拿大英语]仅供参考(不作援引)
白色背景；比色板；比色纸

trans.tran_cn: 背景的；发布背景材料的
出身，背景，底色，幕后，背景音
trans.tran_en: someone’s family, education, previous work etc
